sentences.text: We investigate independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches .
In this paper , events are defined as event terms and associated event elements .
With independent approach , we identify important contents by frequency of events .
With relevant approach , we identify important contents by PageRank algorithm on the event map constructed from documents .

summary: We investigate independent and relevant event-based extractive mutli-document summarization approaches . In this paper , events are defined as event terms and associated event elements . With independent approach , we identify important contents by frequency of events . kg2text: PageRank uses the event map constructed from documents to rank web pages. The algorithm is used for constructing this event map, which represents events extracted and organized from multiple documents. In an independent approach, we identify important contents by frequency of events in a document-based representation of events. This methodology can be applied to event- based extractive summarization approaches. Experimental results are encouraging, indicating the effectiveness of these techniques.
